title: Password Reset Instructions
content:
To reset your password:
1. Click the 'Forgot Password' link on the login page
2. Enter your registered email address
3. Check your email for a password reset link
4. The reset link expires in 24 hours
5. Click the link and enter your new password
6. Your new password must be at least 12 characters and include uppercase, lowercase, numbers, and symbols

title: Refund Policy
content:
Our refund policy:
- 30-day money-back guarantee on all purchases
- To request a refund, contact support with your order number
- Refunds are processed within 5-7 business days
- The original payment method will be credited
- Refunds are not available for custom enterprise contracts (different terms apply)

title: Subscription Upgrade Guide
content:
To upgrade your subscription:
1. Navigate to Account Settings
2. Go to Billing section
3. Click 'Change Plan'
4. Select your desired tier (Basic, Standard, Premium, or Enterprise)
5. Review the pricing and features
6. Confirm the upgrade

The upgrade takes effect immediately. You'll be charged a prorated amount based on your billing cycle. All your existing data and settings are preserved. You can upgrade at any time without losing data.

title: Security and Encryption
content:
Security measures we implement:
- Data in transit: TLS 1.3 encryption
- Data at rest: AES-256 encryption
- SOC 2 Type II certified
- GDPR compliant
- Regular third-party security audits
- 24/7 security monitoring
- Automated threat detection
- Data backups every 6 hours
- Multi-factor authentication (MFA) available
- Role-based access control (RBAC)
- Annual penetration testing

title: Data Export Instructions
content:
To export your data:
1. Go to Settings > Data Export
2. Choose your preferred format:
   - CSV (for spreadsheets)
   - JSON (for developers)
   - XML (for legacy systems)
3. Click 'Request Export'
4. You'll receive an email with the download link within 24 hours

The export includes:
- All user data and profiles
- Activity logs
- Uploaded files and documents
- Configuration settings

There's no limit on how frequently you can export your data.

title: Available Integrations
content:
We offer integrations with popular tools:

Direct Integrations:
- Slack (notifications and commands)
- Microsoft Teams (collaboration)
- Google Workspace (Gmail, Drive, Calendar)
- Salesforce (CRM sync)
- Jira (project management)
- GitHub (code repositories)
- Asana (task management)

Zapier Integration:
- Connect with 100+ additional apps
- Create custom workflows
- Automate data sync

API and Webhooks:
- RESTful API for custom integrations
- Webhooks for real-time events
- Comprehensive API documentation
- SDKs for Python, JavaScript, and Ruby

title: Team Management
content:
Managing your team:

Adding Members:
1. Go to Settings > Team
2. Click 'Invite Members'
3. Enter email addresses (multiple allowed)
4. Assign roles:
   - Admin: Full access to all features and settings
   - Member: Standard access to features
   - Viewer: Read-only access
5. Click 'Send Invitations'

Invitations expire after 7 days. Team members can accept via the email link. You can change roles anytime. Premium and Enterprise plans support unlimited team members. Basic and Standard plans have team size limits.

title: File Upload Limits
content:
File upload limits by subscription tier:

- Basic: 50MB per file
- Standard: 100MB per file
- Premium: 500MB per file
- Enterprise: 2GB per file

Supported file formats:
- Documents: PDF, DOCX, XLSX, PPTX, TXT
- Images: PNG, JPG, GIF, SVG, WEBP
- Videos: MP4, MOV, AVI (Premium and Enterprise only)
- Archives: ZIP, RAR, TAR

There's no limit on the total number of files. Storage limits apply based on your subscription tier.

title: Support Channels
content:
Support options by subscription tier:

Basic and Standard:
- Email support (response within 24 hours)
- Live chat support (weekdays 9am-6pm EST)
- Help center and documentation
- Community forum

Premium:
- All Basic/Standard channels
- Phone support (weekdays 9am-6pm EST)
- Priority response (within 4 hours)
- Video call support

Enterprise:
- All Premium channels
- 24/7 phone support
- Dedicated account manager
- Custom SLA available
- On-site training available

All customers can submit tickets through the support portal.

title: Free Trial Information
content:
Our free trial offer:

- Duration: 14 days
- Full access to Premium features
- No credit card required to start
- No automatic billing after trial ends
- All data is preserved if you upgrade
- Can upgrade to paid plan anytime during trial
- Trial can be extended once (requires approval)

To start your trial:
1. Click 'Start Free Trial' on our homepage
2. Create your account with email and password
3. Verify your email address
4. Start using all Premium features immediately

After the trial, you can choose to upgrade to a paid plan or continue with the free Basic plan (limited features).

title: Account Cancellation
content:
To cancel your subscription:
1. Go to Settings > Billing
2. Click 'Cancel Subscription'
3. Provide feedback (optional)
4. Confirm cancellation

Important notes:
- Cancellation takes effect at the end of your current billing period
- You'll retain access until the billing period ends
- No refunds for partial months (except within 30-day guarantee)
- Your data is retained for 90 days after cancellation
- You can reactivate your account within 90 days without data loss
- After 90 days, all data is permanently deleted

title: Two-Factor Authentication
content:
Setting up Two-Factor Authentication (2FA):

1. Go to Settings > Security
2. Click 'Enable Two-Factor Authentication'
3. Choose your method:
   - Authenticator app (recommended): Google Authenticator, Authy, etc.
   - SMS: Receive codes via text message
   - Email: Receive codes via email
4. Scan the QR code with your authenticator app
5. Enter the 6-digit code to confirm
6. Save your backup codes in a secure location

2FA is required for:
- Enterprise accounts (mandatory)
- Accounts with admin privileges
- Access to sensitive features

You can disable 2FA anytime from Security settings.
